seasons of service with the Eagles. Tagging Michael Vick . If the Eagles hope to use the franchise tag on Michael Vick , it should be available to them even amid the NFL's labor unrest. decision taken by the International Committee of Museums( ICOM) to establish an international supervision committee to oversee and monitor the Egyptian Museum in an attempt to protect it following the recent attempt to loot it.
